title: S&P 500 Snaps Losing Streak on Cooler Inflation, Tech Rebound
description: Stocks rebounded Thursday as a cooler-than-expected inflation report lifted hopes that the Federal Reserve would cut interest rates further. An optimistic outlook in the tech sector also boosted sentiment.
content: Stocks rebounded Thursday as a cooler-than-expected inflation report lifted hopes that the Federal Reserve would cut interest rates further. An optimistic outlook in the tech sector also boosted sentiment.
